snippet: Regional and partisan differences aside, President Obama, Gov. Scott Walker of Wisconsin and former Gov. Jeb Bush of Florida have at least one thing in common: all are filling out N.C.A.A. tournament brackets this week.
abstract: Regional and partisan differences aside, President Obama, Gov. Scott Walker of Wisconsin and former Gov. Jeb Bush of Florida have at least one thing in common: all are filling out N.C.A.A. tournament brackets this week.

headline.main: Jeb Bush’s Pick to Win It All, and It’s Not Kentucky
